Description::en: Sets the question type, see above
Unique ID (name) of the question, is saved to XML
Question or group label if using only one survey language, is displayed on screen
Notes::en: ::[language] is optional

Description::en: Hint for a question if using only one language
Notes::en: ::[language] is optional

Description::en: Special kind of hint that is normally not shown in the form, only in special views.
Notes::en: ::[language] is optional

Description::en: Define the allowed values to a response
The message a user is shown if the response was not valid
Notes::en: ::[language] is optional

Description::en: Whether a question has to be answered in order for the form to continue/be saved
Notes::en: Allowed values: yes, no, TRUE, FALSE, true(), false(); or a statement that evaluates as true or false

Description::en: Allows to customize the error message if required question is not answered
Notes::en: ::[language] is optional

Description::en: A default value that is pre-filled before the user gets to the question
Skip logic condition (the relevant condition that needs to be fulfilled in order for the present question to be displayed)
Whether a question response can be edited
Notes::en: Allowed values: yes, no, TRUE, FALSE, true(), false(); or a statement that evaluates as true or false

Description::en: Only relevant for calculate questions: a mathematical expression that can be referenced elsewhere
Number of repeats for a repeat group
An image to be shown with a question
Audio to be included with a question
A video to be included with a question

include custom XML content for the bind attribute
include custom XML content in the body

Notes::en: optional settings in parameters column to enable location tracking: location-priority, location-min-interval, location-max-age

Description::en: User can choose one of several choices
User can choose one or more of several choices
User can choose one of several choices from an external file
Notes::en: Optional settings in parameters column: 'value' (string, default = 'name') for the choice value column in the external file, 'label' (string, default = 'label') for the choice label column in the external file, 'randomize' (bool, default = 'false') to activate choice randomization, and 'seed' (number, default = none) to set the randomization seed value.

Description::en: User can choose one or more of several choices from an external file
Notes::en: Optional settings in parameters column: 'value' (string, default = 'name') for the choice value column in the external file, 'label' (string, default = 'label') for the choice label column in the external file, 'randomize' (bool, default = 'false') to activate choice randomization, and 'seed' (number, default = none) to set the randomization seed value.

Description::en: User can rank a list of choices
User can enter a text response
User can enter an integer
User can enter a decimal number

User can take or attach a picture
User can record or attach audio

Description::en: Audio is recorded in the background while filling the form
